TEXT.TITLE: <GRAND METROPOLITAN PLC> UNIT TO SELL BUSINESS
TEXT.BODY: Grand Metropolitan PLC said its Grandmet USA Inc unit decided to sell its physical fitness and exercise equipment business. The company said Morgan Stanely and Co Inc is advising it on the sale of the business. Reuter
